I'm Front-end Developer

The main area of my expertise is Front End Development with a focus on programming. I bring design ideas to life using programming languages and any other technologies necessary for the project. I value responsive, accessible websites and clean design patterns with thoughtful interactions.

My websites are

Responsive

Layouts adjust to screen size.

Intuitive

Browsing the site is simple and intuitive.

Dynamic

Power of javascript to make the website dynamic.

Fast

Optimization of a website is key to make the website fast on any device.
